Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the video by stating that it prompted nationwide outrage in India. The extent of the outrage is not clearly supported.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the video is indeed of the Indian police beating a suspect in the Hyderabad rape-murder case. The video actually shows a different incident of police and local residents beating a man accused of raping a 10-year-old girl.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is related to the Hyderabad rape-murder case without providing sufficient evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the video, such as it being unrelated to the Hyderabad case.
